Name: Waverley City Libraries, Local History Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-4pm by appointment; closed public holidays. Reference assistance available in person or by telephone.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit by telephone required including details of research.

About.Acquisition focus: Any documentation with historical relevance to City of Waverley. (5% in-house).

About.Major holdings: Leader Newspapers: Waverley Gazette 1961- (5m). Progress Press: Chadstone Progress/Waverley Progress 1962-1972 (2m).
